response.overview: A young dreamer named Dameli, who finds comfort in her memories and the presence of her guardian angel, meets a new acquaintance â€” a boy who shares her passion for photography but lives fully in the present. As their connection deepens, Dameli begins to see life through his eyes and slowly learns to let go of her past. Nostalgia remains a part of her, but it no longer holds her back.
response.title: Dameli
